potioneer.luck.event_cast_0: The wheels of fate turn to you.
potioneer.luck.event_cast_1: Churning away, they decide your fate.
potioneer.luck.event_cast_2: A calling is heard from the blue.
potioneer.luck.event_cast_3: A cacophony of something terrible, or something great
potioneer.luck.fortune_event: You feel much more efficient at mining ores
reputation.potioneer.confirmation: Interact while crouching to begin following %s
reputation.potioneer.following: You have sworn fielty to the Deity %s
reputation.potioneer.prayer: You sense that your prayer has been heard.
reputation.potioneer.lady_fate: Your destiny has been touched by the hands of %s
reputation.potioneer.king_of_heroes: You now stand beneath the tyrannical gaze of %s
reputation.potioneer.mre: %s has cast "His" eyes upon you with mild entertainment.
reputation.potioneer.fighting_god: Your boldness has been accepted by %s
advancements.potioneer.formula.title: Potioneer
advancements.potioneer.sapphire.title: The mystical ore
advancements.potioneer.sapphire.descript: Obtain your first piece of sapphire, the cornerstone of beyonders
advancements.potioneer.potion_cauldron.d: Obtain the potion cauldron for concocting potions
advancements.potioneer.beyonder_potion.d: I'm going to have to hold your hand when I say - you may die here.
gui.potioneer.has_secondary_function: This ability has a secondary function
contents.potioneer.introduction: Humans must depend upon a variety of potions to travel the path of supreme ascension. Each pathway begins at sequence 9, and the lower one descends, the stronger they become, rivaling even the Gods themselves. This is but a short introduction to the hidden world of Beyonders.
contents.potioneer.formula_top: Firstly, you'll want to find a fitting sequence 9 potion formula.
contents.potioneer.formula_bottom: Search far and wide for one that speaks to you. There are many sequence 9 potions.
contents.potioneer.cauldron_top: Once you have chosen to concoct a potion, you must create a dedicated potion cauldron.
contents.potioneer.cauldron_bottom: Make sure you use the right proportions of water, and light a fire beneath if needed.
contents.potioneer.pathway: There are plenty of pathways out there, and each one converges to their own level of power. Each has a theme, but they're all distinct.
contents.potioneer.ingredients: A formula's ingredients are broken down into 2 sections: main and supplementary. The resulting potion depends only on the main ingredients, but it can only be fully concocted with the supplementary ingredients combined. There is, however, a way to concoct a potion if you don't have access to the main ingredients...
contents.potioneer.spirituality: Beyonders cast abilities by consuming their spirituality. This is detrimental on the spirit, and lowers their sanity if they overexert themselves, but nothing a simple day-long rest won't fix. You can recuperate using Cogitation
contents.potioneer.sanity: Beyonders are guardians, but also a bunch of miserable wretches, constantly fighting against dangers and madness. Their sanity is limited by the digestion of their characteristics, and if it's low enough they'll start taking damage.
contents.potioneer.acting: "You don't 'grasp' potions, you digest them. Nor is it about 'discovery' but acting. A potion's name is not only symbolic, it is also Imagery. When digesting potions, it's key."
contents.potioneer.advancing: To advance, you must consume a potion of the following level to yours, but it must be of the same pathway as the one where you started. Attempting to 'switch' pathways will only result in immediately losing control and dying.
contents.potioneer.mistakes: It is possible to consume a potion and skip levels, though incredibly foolish and dangerous. If you have found yourself in this predicament, you won't feel as mentally well as you might hope for, but to fix that it's as simple as consuming the missing potions you skipped, you doofus.
contents.potioneer.characteristic: When a Beyonder dies, they have a chance of dropping one or more of their characteristics. These can be used as replaced for the main ingredients of a potion formula. Generally, you'll drop your last characteristic if you die with low sanity.
contents.potioneer.lady_fate:
Honorific name:
%s

Lady Fate is the Goddess who symbolizes Fate, Time and Infinity. Despite not being considered an orthodox deity, few would regard "Her" as evil.
contents.potioneer.temp_luck_charm_top: The Temporary Luck charm is most suited for battle.
contents.potioneer.temp_luck_charm_botto: When cast, it will grant the target with generally positive luck for a while
contents.potioneer.instant_luck_charm_to: The Instant luck charm is most suited for quick spurts of great luck.
contents.potioneer.instant_luck_charm_bo: When cast, it will grant the target with a significant amount of luck, but it won't last much time.
contents.potioneer.king_of_heroes:
Honorific name:
%s

The King of Heroes is a God who symbolizes Order, Chaos and Tyranny. One of the three orthodox deities, "He" is quite particular about his followers.
contents.potioneer.rituals_candles_top: In a ritual, the amount of candles dictates who you are targeting and how many.
contents.potioneer.rituals_candles_botto: One candle to target oneself, another to contact another existence, and a third one to specify a victim.
contents.potioneer.rituals_ink_top: Ritualistic Ink is what delimits the area of a ritual.
contents.potioneer.rituals_ink_bottom: It must form a closed area around the altar, and every pedestal inside will be counted in the offerings.
contents.potioneer.rituals_dagger_top: A Ritualistic Dagger is a tool used to trigger a ritual.
contents.potioneer.rituals_dagger_bottom: It forms a barrier of spirituality, allowing you to communicate with your desired target.
contents.potioneer.rituals_offerings_top: Place your offerings in pedestals inside the ritual area.
contents.potioneer.rituals_offerings_bot: They'll serve as recipient for ingredients, and these can be used to target specific existences.
contents.potioneer.charm_101: To craft charms, you simply do a ritual to the proper existence. If their powers allow for it, and they so desire, it'll be crafted. The quantity of base material determines the duration of the associated effect, while the reputation and level of the target determines the level of the effect.
contents.potioneer.appraisal: The appraisal ability lets you see a lot of previously hidden information. Things like the pathway of an item, the downsides of an artifact, or whether a potion was correctly made, can be determined with just a glance. Alternatively, you can also use coins to divine potion concoction success.
potioneer.pathway.trap_effect_1: Trap effect set to Water Prison
potioneer.pathway.trap_effect_2: Trap effect set to Teleport Beneath
potioneer.message.water_trap_activated: One of your water traps was triggered.
potioneer.message.acting_complete: You feel your potion completely digesting.
message.potioneer.dream_clue: You hear a message in your dreams: %s
message.potioneer.invalid_ink_area: Invalid ink boundary. The maximum radius is %s
message.potioneer.insufficient_spiritual: You are too drained to cast %s.
ability.potioneer.no_pick_saved: You have no pickaxe to recall
ability.potioneer.no_ore_in_hand: Cast ability with an ore in hand to locate it.
potioneer.short_desc.cogitation: Your essence... your being... this is what makes you
potioneer.long_desc.cogitation: Concentrate your spirituality and recuperate in a safe place.
potioneer.characteristic.corrupt: Your %s has been corrupted by a characteristic
potioneer.short_desc.zero_damage: Damage taken to tools in your hand can be nullified
potioneer.short_desc.miner_light: Conjure a source of light from another dimension
potioneer.short_desc.miner_light_2: Collapse infinity down to generate light.
potioneer.short_desc.void_vision: Miners were born in the void, and the void was made for you.
potioneer.long_desc.void_vision: You gain the ability to see in the dark.
potioneer.short_desc.pick: A trusty old friend is always at your beck and call.
potioneer.long_desc.pick: Store a pickaxe item, and recreate it whenever you want.
potioneer.short_desc.mining_1: Your hands know not what they are not.
potioneer.short_desc.mining_2: Your control over speed enhances your mining.
potioneer.long_desc.mining_2: You can now customize the mining speed bonus.
potioneer.short_desc.wheel_knowledge: As you ascend even higher, more knowledge floods your mind.
potioneer.long_desc.wheel_knowledge: Check your book! You gain knowledge when advancing.
potioneer.short_desc.silk: You know the best way to carefully break blocks.
potioneer.long_desc.silk: While active, you can mine blocks with silk touch.
potioneer.short_desc.fortune: The doors of fate open to greater treasures
potioneer.long_desc.fortune: Based on your luck, you can get a greater yield per ore.
potioneer.short_desc.calamity: The further one descends this path, the lonelier they become.
potioneer.long_desc.calamity: The more artifacts you have, the lower your luck tends to be.
potioneer.short_desc.calamity_2: You have been marked by Fate to receive its blessings
potioneer.long_desc.calamity_2: Artifacts lower your luck, and you trigger events more often.
potioneer.short_desc.target_appraisal_1: Your appraisal skills allow you to peer into the depths of fate.
potioneer.long_desc.target_appraisal_1: You can see the stats and luck of anyone you look at.
potioneer.short_desc.target_appraisal_2: Fate chose to show more of its secrets to you.
potioneer.long_desc.target_appraisal_2: If you have an item with someone's spirituality, you can see their stats.
potioneer.short_desc.block_appraisal: Your skills let you find ores around you with ease, as if magic.
potioneer.long_desc.block_appraisal: L-Click to to find ores in your hand, R-Click count ores around you
potioneer.short_desc.appraisal: Your skills let you find ores around you with ease, as if magic.
potioneer.long_desc.appraisal: L-Click to to find ores in your hand, R-Click count ores around you
potioneer.short_desc.air_bullet: Surprise your enemies with a well timed gun shot
potioneer.long_desc.air_bullet: Shoot an air bullet from your mouth. It pierces targets. Damage scales with sequence.
potioneer.short_desc.door_opening: Open a door through any obstacle in your way
potioneer.long_desc.door_opening: Lets you teleport to the other side of any obstacle. Teleport distance scales with sequence.
message.potioneer.luck_boost_grant: The cogs of fate favor you for now...
message.potioneer.effect_already_exists: Could not give effect: one already exists.
